title: My First Foray into ComfyUI
excerpt: The term "ComfyUI" can sound intimidating. It conjures images of complex algorithms and self-aware systems running entire data centers. While that's the ultimate vision, my first real journey into ComfyUI started with a much more tangible, and frankly, frustrating problem: alert fatigue.

title: My First Foray into AIOps
excerpt: The term "AIOps" can sound intimidating. It conjures images of complex algorithms and self-aware systems running entire data centers. While that's the ultimate vision, my first real journey into AIOps started with a much more tangible, and frankly, frustrating problem: alert fatigue.

title: Python Scripting Best Practices for Automation
excerpt: Python is the de facto language for automation engineering, but writing a script that "just works" is very different from writing a script that is robust, maintainable, and scalable. Over the years, I've developed a set of best practices that I apply to all my automation projects.

title: My First Foray into Python
excerpt: The term "Python" can sound intimidating. It conjures images of complex algorithms and self-aware systems running entire data centers. While that's the ultimate vision, my first real journey into Python started with a much more tangible, and frankly, frustrating problem: alert fatigue.
